categories: Category:Star Wars Insider Special Edition 2014 articles

nodes.text: Becoming Luke is an interview with Mark Hamill conducted by Charles Lippincott in January 1977, a few months before the release of Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope. This article also includes a Top 5 of Luke Skywalker's best actions through the original trilogy and a review of his costumes. It was published in Star Wars Insider 137 and later reprinted in Star Wars Insider Special Edition 2014.
